Dialogue: Getting tired of that that eye telling you what to do yet? You can beat it ya know.
Yea, I know what you are. Surprised that no one else caught on. I mean, what the hell, just look at ya. Maybe I just see you differently.
May not look it, but there was a time that I heard that other voice in my head. Told me to climb to the sky, promised me a new world. Trippy, huh?
Power like that is hard to pass up. But uniting with that thing? Nuh uh, hold on now, what does that even mean?
This world may end one way or another but I know one thing. I go out on my own terms. When the time comes, will you?
